website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular model is recognized for its affordable price point and reliability.
pros: Seat can adjust for various heights
Handlebars move for upper body workouts
Customers appreciate how sturdy and stable they feel on the bike despite its lightweight frame
cons: A little small for some users

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This bike has been a complete and total disappointment. A waste of money. It started making noises, clunking and chunking within 10 days of owning it. Serious issues with the flywheel. The photo above shows an accumulation of black dust building underneath the bike. I don’t see any way of adjusting the wheel to eliminate it striking and rubbing against the factory frame. I was trying to use it daily for light exercise, two 20 minute sessions. I’ve had it a little more than 2 months, and it’ll be roadside with the garbage soon. Just a piece of junk! Highly disappointed....👎
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Skip this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Not that happy with it. Assembly wasn’t too bad but will take approximately 45 min. It’s lightweight (both good & bad) and the handles are comfortable. The seat is stiff and will make you sore after 20 min. It came missing the distance/calorie display completely. Had to make several emails n calls to rectify that situation. Now after a month of daily use the front wheel wobbles violently and loud no matter which resistance setting i set it on. Waste of money. Buy a better brand for more $ and you won’t have regrets like me.
customer_reviews.author: Keith o

customer_reviews.title: Very hard small seat about the right size for a child.
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the exercise bike I purchased. The bike itself is a good product for the price, but the seat is terrible it's too small and too hard and this is supposed to be an improved seat. I talked to the company and they wouldn't do anything, they just said send it back which would be very difficult as the packing material fell apart as I unpacked it. I asked the company for a better seat or give me a small refund to purchase a better seat locally and they refused. I don't know why Amazon puts up with a company so inflexable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get on my bike and ride!
customer_reviews.text: Was a great investment, made it easier for this 60 year old woman to get back in to shape. Put it together myself, not to difficult, it's holding still so that is a plus. I have it in my living room, ride it every evening, I lost 6 pounds in a month! I can feel the difference, I have more energy!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Wetmore

customer_reviews.title: Broke 5 days past return window
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who in the past had a similar exercise bike. At first everything was perfect, but then she noticed it was getting harder and harder to pedal. Turns out in the delivery the main body portion, the part that comes already pre-built by company, somehow got loose. So as my mom pedaled the main wheel slowly twisted until finally it began to grind down the sides of the housing. Now my carpet has a fine black dust where the bike was stationed and I am stuck with a useless bike. Very disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless to me... even at $90.
customer_reviews.text: Even at sub-$100, you are not getting a good deal with this bike. Cheap is great, but nothing is as expensive as something you're not going to use and sadly I can't use this bike. This bike is way too small to be useful. Even my wife, who is 5'5", agreed (although she later was able to adapt to it and make some use out of it). Your knees are pressed up against your shoulders, practically, never allowing you to get a natural, comfortable pedal stroke.
customer_reviews.author: S.D. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Get it because you should
customer_reviews.text: Great workout bike. Especially for the price. I definitely recommend you buying this bike. Im 5'7 weighing 230 pounds and this bike is great. Took me 2 hours to assemble. But it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: I did it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled my exercise bike yesterday but need to post this. The directions, plus little video on Amazon, were excellent. So easy to understand that it only took me a couple of hours. I am a nearly 70-year-old female with weak hands and I was able to get this done with no problem. Admittedly, I am good at following directions and have assembled things in the past so this kind of thing is in my wheelhouse but... These are the best directions I have ever seen!! I have only been on the bike for about 5 minutes but so far so good. I'll update as needed :-)
customer_reviews.author: JoLyn

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment but small
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these bikes years ago and loved it. The price of this was right and I ordered. It comes well packaged and has solid instructions -- and the tools to do so. The rub for me is that I'm 6-0 tall and the seat does not go up high enough to allow for the kind of leg extension necessary for a safe ride. If you are well under the 6 mark or have short legs this would be great for you. I returned it with regret.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps hugely to have a better day.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move about on carpet - I just slide it. Noise level is average/typical for this type equipment. Easy to crank music up to a level above the machines noise. One person assembly - I didn't time it but maybe thirty minutes. Overall rating is 5 star; this is not the best of this type equipment but it is well worth the money. I"m a little over 6' tall and the seat adjusts easily for my height.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am overall happy with my purchase, I purchased the bike due to the COVID-19 pandemic my gym is closed until further notice. There were some parts of the bike that were difficult to put together, I'm glad my daughter was able to assist with assembly. My only complaint is the bike seat, it is unconfortable and leaves my buttocks sore. I would use the bike more, however I don't look forward to being sore for 1-2 days afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Taisha

customer_reviews.title: Measure your purchase carefully (or rather your height!)
customer_reviews.text: Bike (for the money) is well made. Adjustments to flywheel tension is very easy to make. These are the positives. The negatives: Seat is very, very uncomfortable and some sort of cover will be purchased shortly (gel or other). The major issue is the bike is designed for people short in stature! I'm 5' 8" (31" inseam) and the seat does not adjust up enough to keep my knees from bending uncomfortably! Fortunately I can alter the mounting mechanism to give about another inch of height, and I'm hoping that is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Poor old dadTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last a year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this bike after I saw all the reviews, worked well for the first 8 months, then it started making loud shrieking noises from the front wheel. I contacted amazon, was told I had to contact Body Max, they sent me new bearings and different bolts and said I needed to replace these, did this worked again for another 3 months, now is doing the same. Not under warranty anymore. I am wondering if anyone else has had this issue. I am going to try to contact company again and see if they can do anything to help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby for the price point and getting the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too shabby for the price point and getting the bones moving. However, it is a slight inconvenience as the tension mechanism is a bit more than incremental as it is showcased. The band on the wheel wears down quicker than I would expect leaving me to tight down the tension to get the same consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C Waits

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for price! Nice tension and good workout.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, but seat is uncomfortable. Make sure purchase a sperate seat cover to your liking. I bout one at Meijers a Schwinn memory foam one. Just bought it. Also the calorie count is exaggerated. It not accurate according to the mach8ne at planet fitness. So, I know about how many calories I burn in a workout. This machine exaggerated it by almost 200 points! But this too is small issue. Most smart phone apps can give you a calorie count for your workout. I hope this helps. Overall very satisfied. It's a great workout and it's compact and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Tarri B

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise bike.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this exercise bike for my husband. He had knee surgery on both knees (not a the same time) and the doctor recommended he ride his bike as much as possible. Unfortunately he refused to go out in the rain and couldn't ride outside in the snow. With this indoor exercise bike he can ride and watch TV at the same time. The moving handlebars make it a complete workout and he actually enjoys doing it, which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: elsieonthelakeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Bad description, just bad
customer_reviews.text: This is not a fan bike or air bike, it doesnt move air, no air touches you. Very easy to put together, if you know what your are doing, would take 15 minutes. The crank travel is very small, the bike is small, much like riding a kids bike. It is not worth what I spent. Refund. Designers of this product should reconsider 'everything'.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an assault style bike but I didnt want to pay Rogue prices. Its compact but definitely supports me at 6'0 and 195lbs. Would def purchase again. I hit 6 miles or so on it a day over the past 6 months or so and it is holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JBrock808

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for the price. Easy to assemble. Not too noisy, however I keep it outdoors so noise isn't an issue. The seat is surprisingly comfortable. I'm 5'6" and the bike fits me perfectly. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the monitor has to be unplugged and plugged in again before each use to work. Also, I'm not totally convinced it is accurate in regards to calories burned. The difference between it and my fitness tracker are extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike ! It took me about 90 minutes to assemble. The instructions were very clear. My husband who is 190 gets on and there have been no structural issues. Comes very well packaged. Very nice for the price, and I researched many. Only thing we did was get a gel seat cover as the seat was just a little hard even though it is padded. I would recommend. I was surprised at the low price for the quality that it is .
customer_reviews.author: mozboz2

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bike. VERY high resistance settings.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike is an awesome addition to my home gym ( I have an elliptical and rowing machine as well) it easily has the most resistance of all my machines meaning that I can get my cardio and weight training in at once and I will never "outgrow " the bike. I tightened the resistance strap with pliers. It was not too hard to put together except where you screw the pedals in. You have to shave off the medal inside the holes to screw it in and even with wd -40 I broke three tools without getting the screws all the way through. They will not be coming off anytime soon, even of I wanted them too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Dont waste your money. The front wheel has bushings instead of bearings and were worn out in 3 months. Replacing them is a royal pain even having the tools and knowledge of how to do this. Sold it at the yard sale right after I fixed it. Imported China crap.
customer_reviews.author: golfnutinga

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Been looking for a stationary bike didn't want all the bling! Just needed something that I could put 20 mins a day on and this bike is just right. Can use the arms or not but it is exactly what I wanted for my Michigan winters. The size is small enough and light weight enough for me to move it around from room to room easily. Assembly was easy along with the directions. Great buy for $100.00 had looked at stores around and Amazon's price was $50.00 to $70.00 dollars cheaper for the exact same brand.
customer_reviews.author: N  Gawron

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike. It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Easy to assemble Took me an hour. I’m over 400lbs and I’ve been riding at least 3 times a week. Only problem is the seat really hurts. I don’t think the bike is made for taller people either. I’m 5’7 & after riding for 20 mins it can get a little uncomfortable. For the price though it’s really good my mom loves it but does agree it could be better for people with longer legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got this bike for my wife. We had a magnetic one and it didnt last long. Wanted to try a fan bike. Still has a chain on it not all fan. Easy to put together. Not too heavy. Seat is not very soft so cant imagine what it was before the new softer seat design. Makes a little more noise than expected. Had it for 2 days and is working good. Can only raise seat up or down not forward.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, but not for bad knees.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made bike, but had to return it as unusable. The bike is made to be used by someone much younger and more flexible than me (I am 69 and have bad knees). The seat is terribly uncomfortable. In order to work the pedals without bending my knees backward, I would have to raise the seat so high that I would be unable to mount the bike without using a stool (I am 5' tall). My husband, who is 5'11" found the bike to be for someone a little shorter than him - he had to sit on the very back of the seat. The bike went together fairly easily; the instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: coloradosaver

customer_reviews.title: Junk purchase and should be taken off of amazon. Dangerous bike!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this bike a 0 star, I would. It completely fell apart after two weeks of using it. We even bought new bolts and glue to try and keep the handles from falling off. Nothing has worked so far. While riding it the bike comes apart and it’s very dangerous. Now the wheel is making a really loud noise and is falling apart. Buyers beware, you get what you pay for. Even that is too expensive for junk. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Just The Size Unit We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes only partly assembled so it does require a bit of effort to put assemble. The instructions are very well written and makes assembly pretty easy, even for an 85 year old person like me. We did have to order a Biker Large Exercise Bike Seat Cushion for the unit. The seat that comes with the unit was a little small and hard for our older bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: frogman

customer_reviews.title: Too small and poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for an adult human and poorly constructed so that it rocks back and forth while you pedal. Some reviews say it's size is ok for anyone under 6'... I am 5'8", and it's way too small. I have to hunch over to use the handlebars. The base is too small and it rocks while I pedal. The construction is cheap and I can see this thing will not last. Wish I had spent more to get more. This is not a 4 star product, which Amazon users voted so far on average.
customer_reviews.author: Novice Investor

customer_reviews.title: Price for unit is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Price is definitely great for the unit. This is all you need to burn some fat. I turn up the tension to have a good workout. I only have to semi bad things to say, the new seat is still in the semi hard side. After a while it does get uncomfortable. And my second thing is the calorie counter. Idk how accurate the calorie counter is. If you have a heart rate monitor and just keep your heart rate up and google some things you can figure out how many you actually burned.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Does its job at a budget price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 5 years now and it is my no excuse cardio workout alternative. It gets used about 3-8 times a week and my toddler plays on it all the time so I would say its durability has been fair. I would echo what I remember past reviews said about the height being a bit on the lower side as my legs are a bit more bent than I would prefer ( I am 5'10"). But hey you get what you pay for and this is definitely a budget exercise bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad quality
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE I only had this bike 2 months. I ride 4 to 5 times a week. DO NOT buy this bike for avid exercise. It is pure junk. Read the other reviews The clunking was the first to start, then tension moved on its own. Feels like the chain is gonna snap any minute. Calorie counter is way off. I cant even say you get what you pay for. I only was able to use 2 months. I'm sick about this. $100 down the tubes
customer_reviews.author: Christel S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my husbands knee replacement recovery. Please don’t waste your money. It lasted only a few months, it shredded metal fragments in my carpet, it was clunky and wobbly. We took it to the dump as we received no response from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Kiraly

customer_reviews.title: It is a good solid exercise bike
customer_reviews.text: It is a good solid exercise bike. Not the tightest tolerances for manufacturing but it works. Make sure you get everything tight or it will wobble. It will. I got it together by myself in about 30 minutes using their included stamped wrench. The supplied wrench worked ok but I wish I would have brough my own open ended wrenches in from the truck. It uses a strap to increase tension on the flywheel. You can turn the adjustment wheel a lot with out changing the resistance. You can tighten it up enough to make it very difficult to pedal so that means you have lots of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ward

customer_reviews.title: I put it together pretty quickly it’s nice when companies put numbers on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner who has MS. I put it together pretty quickly it’s nice when companies put numbers on the packaging. The only thing I recommend is something like JB Blaster or Lubricant spray. I tried to muscle a few parts and had a lot of problems until I grabbed the spray and they went right in. I was fearful of putting this together but if I can do it... you can too :)
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: so far so GREAT!!! was pretty easy to put together and I love using it! I put it in front of my TV and work out while I watch!!! so much better than sitting on the couch just watching ya know? LOL...anyway, great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Austin

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a Schwinn, very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Sort of had my heart on a Schwinn AD-7 but they wouldn't ship to Hawaii. Actually glad in the end as this one was a fraction of the cost and I can no longer see that the AD-7 if worth THAT much more. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Waimea Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: The chain broke after 10 months of use, riding 2-3 miles per day (under 610 miles). The manufacturer's one-year warranty does not include in-home repair so I had to pay someone first to open the bike to see what was wrong and then to replace the broken chain. Very disappointed in this bike. The manufacturer did not offer a refund which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can adjust it to fast and slow
customer_reviews.text: So far my body Rider is helping me to loose the weight that i am aiming for. I ride it twice daily and it is helping. I like that you can adjust it to fast and slow.
customer_reviews.author: Lucina

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for long.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one month before it got extremely wobbly, shaky and squeaky. The chain area started leaving metal shavings all over my floor. I am a reasonably fit woman and used it 30 minutes a few times a week. Very disappointed it didn’t hold up longer than 2 weeks past when I’m able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to put together, and works well. However, if you are 5'7" or taller this bike will feel to short for you. Also the seat is uncomfortable and cannot be replace for a regular bike seat.
customer_reviews.author: Heins

customer_reviews.title: Floppy tension belt
customer_reviews.text: Received my body rider fan bike today Assembly was a bit tedious, but instructions were clear EXCEPT.......the tension belt is loose and dangling.. No where can I find instructions for where the lower end connects. I have emailed the company My husband called and they told him where to hook the belt. By the way... Several people have posted about how good this bike was after their knee surgery, I am 5'1" max I am 5 weeks post total knee replacement This seat will not go high enough for me to pedal yet. I have 95 degrees flexion. May be the incline of the bike/seat? My husband is 6'1" and can ride this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: More or less happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cycle for my father. Instructions aren't straight-forward enough for everyone; he had a rough time trying to put the bike together. Customer service was quite helpful. Once put together, the bike seemed like it could be more sturdy, but it was certainly adequate for the price. No significant complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but painful seat
customer_reviews.text: I would say I love this bike but the seat is torture. I did buy a cover but it's not that helpful. I will keep trying until I get the right seat cushion. Otherwise it's great but one odd thing is one pedal is metal and the other one is plastic. Not sure what that's all about I had someone I know assemble it. It took them an hour and a half. Less time then suggested time for paying for the expert assemblers for $78.00
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this unit to anyone who is looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built and designed priced very reasonable prompt delivery so after about a month of use I have to say it is a very pleasing experience. This was bought to aid my wife in her recovery from a broken ankle. I recommend this unit to anyone who is looking for a reasonable exercise bike that has the quality to survive for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Tick

customer_reviews.title: Great bike - buy a different seat
customer_reviews.text: This bike has worked great for us, we have had it for 2 years and definitely gotten our $100 out of it. HOWEVER, note that we bought a different seat for the bike - not just a different seat cover. We purchased a Sunlite Cloud-9 Bicycle Suspension Cruiser Saddle, also from Amazon (recommended by another user). When we received the seat, I thought that we might have an issue with putting it on the bike. However, with a little careful maneuvering of the screws and springs - it worked great. It is SO comfortable, I have biked on it for an hour with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still using this on rainy days
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a lot of miles on this bike & I love it. I had to replace the resistance band after many many many many miles but it was cheap & easy.
customer_reviews.author: David Batts

customer_reviews.title: The directions were simple and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The Body Rider was delivered in a short amount of time. I put it together by myself in about 2 1/2 hrs., using the tools included and my pliers. The directions were simple and easy to follow. The bike is pretty quiet and I am very happy w/ the workout I get. I'm still gaining strength following hip replacement surgery and I think the bike will be a good substitution for the running I used to do. I don't know what the previous seat was like, but the "improved" seat is soft enough I won't need an extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Item was received on time and in excellent condition! This item was as described. I selected this item for its perceived value and quality. After receipt, I can confirm that this was a wise purchase decision. I would purchase this again. I would definitely recommend this item. As a consumer like you, I rely on honest reviews when I purchase items and only offer my genuine interpretation. I encourage positive or negative feedback of my review. If my opinion assisted you in any way with your decision on this item please feel free to click "yes" that you found it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you are spending, this is a great buy! It came well shipped. I am capable of minor repairs around the house, putting the bike together was simple. You do need to pay attention to every step and so them IN ORDER. Yes, the seat is hard, but its a sturdy bike for under $100. Everything was well labeled and greased well. I have only used it a few times, I love it. I am 5'4" with longer legs and I use the tallest seat setting and still would raise it more it there were was more space to do so. Might be a bit short for a longer legged tall person. Over all- great buy!
customer_reviews.author: AppleT

customer_reviews.title: I love to work my arms on it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bike for over a year now and it's still going strong, using it 3 times per week. Although the tension dial doesn't work, I pulled the strip on the front wheel tighter and that definitely works to make for more difficult pedaling. The seat is hard, but I have a folded towel on it. I love to work my arms on it, by leaving my feet on the pedals, and only using the arm parts of the bike. I put it together by myself when it came in, and it wasn't difficult. I would recommend this product to anyone. I lost 53 pounds, counting calories and using this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but....
customer_reviews.text: It came missing parts. Had to play email tag with manufacturer to get the parts but once shipped they did come very quickly. It was somewhat easy to put together but the directions don’t really help much. Some parts didn’t quite fit either. Noise level is fairly high so make sure everything is screwed in right. Apart from that, it’s a good workout and very cheap for fitness equipment these days.
customer_reviews.author: Justen T Taafaki

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, seat not so much
customer_reviews.text: Bike is awesome BUT the seat is just not wide enough and hits right under your butt. I bought the additional seat cover for padding and it didn’t do anything to help. Definitely worth the money though so eventually I will get used to the seat but in the mean time my butt is feeling it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vendal

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Falling apart after just 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This bike is complete garbage! Not even two weeks and this bike is starting to break down. Makes every squeaking and clacking noise imaginable, level of resistance changes on its own, and wheel wobbles horribly even after tightening several times! The wheel was shipped preassembled, but I'm pretty certain something is broken on the inside. Overall, very bad product! Would strongly recommend against purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love this AirDyne bike. Pretty easy to put together (although a little confusing on some parts) but once you get the hang of it, it goes extremely fast. I use this as a full body cardio warm up to my regular workouts. Trust me, this is just as high of quality as the commercial ones that cost hundreds, if not thousands, more. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKay

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations.really a nice piece of equipment.keeps my old knees loose without too much strain. Well built. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Grear for the money.. just dont stand on the pedals. I can feel its a little cheap but when used right this thing serves its purpose. This is my back up to my C3
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm 78 years old and I don't intend to do heavy exercising..ie: standing up on the bike...going a break-neck speeds, it is perfect for me..I put it together myself in 2 hours... The directions are wonderful.. It's not a bike for heavy, extreme exercisers but it sure does give me a great workout..... The seat is hard but it's comfortable enough that I don't plan on purchasing another ..
customer_reviews.author: beverly v.

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE! An excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.text: A well designed machine will give the same workout as a Schwinn Airdyne for 10% of the cost. It is sturdy for me at 185 lbs. All components are designed and built to fit but it will take some mechanical ability and about 2 hours to assemble. Instructions are clear, packaging good and shipping prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Feels very restricted & like it's not much of a workout
customer_reviews.text: The motion is very small for a tall person. Feels very restricted & like it's not much of a workout. Will be returning soon. The disassembly feels dauting because they packed it so well for delivery. That was probably the coolest part of this bike...good packaging and assembly directions.
customer_reviews.author: Cerridwen

customer_reviews.title: I just might like exercising!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a couple of days, but so far so good. My husband put it together with no problem. I'm short so we set the seat to it's lowest setting and surprisingly enough had to raise it a little so it fits perfectly. Seat is hard and I unfortunately ordered the wrong size gel pad. Note: Be careful when ordering the "also bought" items pictured with items like this. I didn't check the measurements of either the bike seat or the gel pad so the one I ordered is way too small. Anyway, good uncomplicated little bike, which is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Emm

customer_reviews.title: Great excercise bike at the right price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Easy assembly (but pay attention to details so you won't end up with clicking noises, etc). It's surprisingly quiet. My fan is louder than the noise it produces when in use. They fixed the seat problem but it won't hurt to get a gel seat for additional comfort. Overall is a great bike and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Trekkie

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan - an actual fan bike pushes air ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan - an actual fan bike pushes air up and toward the rider as it is peddled. This on does not. Beware of assembly: took Amazon professional nearly 2 hours and a lot of grumbling to assemble. Very loud squeak began after 10 min of riding - half a bottle of 3-in-1 oil has quieted the noise for now. Not impressed. The description of this product is not truthful.
customer_reviews.author: Counselor

customer_reviews.title: Best assembly instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled the bike, so I can't evaluate it's long term performance. But: the instructions, diagrams, and the parts ID layout was the best i have ever encountered with any purchased product requiring assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kent DeHond

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price you just can't beat this bike. It gives you a great workout and has the necessary adjustments to make it harder or easier. I have found that riding this for even 10 minutes a day keeps my hips aligned. Due to my job my hips will go out of place and this helps minimize the frequency. I did knock off a star for the seat. Extremely hard plastic. Very uncomfortable on the fanny! I bought a gel seat cover and that helped a little but I still have to put a folded towel on top of that. All in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup , falls apart after months of repeated use.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to setup thanks to instructions and fun to use. Had to re tighten after a few weeks of heavy usage, but nothing major. Update: 6/21/2017 After months of heavy use the resistance band shredded apart. I'm able to use the bike but I've had to rig it to provide some resistance. If you're going to exercise on this regularly, I might suggest a more expensive/sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie4Fngrs

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my bike a couple weeks ago. I assembled it pretty easily and have been riding it ever since. It's not too noisy so I can watch TV or listen to music while I workout with no problem. I love the calorie counter and feel I'm making good progress toward my fitness goals. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bike, but be sure to read and understand what it does and does not do. The only reason this bike is not ranked higher is because the handle motion can only be used in the alternating fashion. I was really hoping that it could be used alternating, concurrently and without any motion. Otherwise, it is a good bike. It is not too heavy. I was able to put it together without any major problems. The handles could be a little longer, but that is o.k.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small but probably still worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about durability, yet. It’s pretty small. I’m 6’ and with the seat completely extended I feel like I’m pedaling a BMX bike. I thought about drilling more holes in the seat stem to allow me to extend it further but it’s already a little unstable feeling when extended to its max. The handles are really short too. If it works out & lasts for the 5’7” & under in my household it will be a good deal for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike works hubby and I have lost weight and calories looking to upgrade soon
customer_reviews.author: Love Myself

customer_reviews.title: do not buy unless you are 5 feet tall max
customer_reviews.text: i made a mistake buying this. 1st off, the fan is loud and annoying, 2ndly, the seat is way too low. i am 5'11" and the highest setting for the seat is very low and my knees probably extend to 90 degrees maximum! ridiculous! anyways i bought a sleeve for the seat to extend it to the proper height, and now the handlebars are too low. this is definitely a good bike for poeple who are like 5 feet tall, but not anyone who is a bit taller. anyways i made use of it and i work up a sweat. the resistance can go crazy high so my arms get so pumped they'll all throbbing and veiny. true story
customer_reviews.author: Yueyang Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t leave less than a star. I had the bike about 2 months and the chain fell off and I can find metal grindings all the time after use! Don’t buy this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only weighs a little over 40 pounds so my wife easily moves it where she wants it
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this so far. Not hard to assemble ( I am very mechanically inclined) nor do I see a reason anybody else can't manage. Only weighs a little over 40 pounds so my wife easily moves it where she wants it. It's also VERY quiet. It's perfect for when she uses it at night after putting the kids to bed. Our treadmill sounds like a dump truck compared to this thing . I also like that the fan portion is shrouded so it doesn't freeze you to death while you use it. If you're even looking at this item, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Good at first.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bike when I first got it. But after a few months of using it a awful loud screech keeps coming from it making it very annoying to use. I've tried wearing headphones but I can still hear the noise. It was easy to put together, size is good but it has some annoying and loud defects.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: The most expensive coat rack I've ever bought for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise at minimal cost
customer_reviews.text: I have an injured rotator cuff and wanted to still get both arm and leg exercise when not able to be outdoors in the winter. The bike works well although I am having to tighten the screws regularly. Other than that, I am delighted with the bike and find I get a good workout. One cannot beat the price! I put the bike together myself and found the directions were excellent (as a 68 y.o female).
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: Terrific and affordable bike
customer_reviews.text: I was having knee problems a few years ago and my orthopedic surgeon recommended getting an exercise bike. I didn't expect it to help, but I now have NO knee pain...as long as I keep exercising. This is my second Body Rider. I had to leave my first one behind when I moved but missed it so much I came back to Amazon for another. This is an updated version with a higher seat option and I am happy that I can extend my legs farther. Excellent $99 bike! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: Crap shoot
customer_reviews.text: 2nd bike started making horrible 'broken' noises on the inside of the main body after having a few months. Only used for ~25 minutes each week. Out of warranty. Not worth trying to fix. First one I bought lasted about 3.5 years before the front strap broke. Disappointed with new one.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E.

customer_reviews.title: Not so good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not so good product for the price. Would not recommend, fan is rediculous and doesn't work. Seat is useless and this bike is made for a person that is less than 5'5". I kept getting ads from amazon to upgrade my seat. Why spend another $40. When I went to Walmart and bought exactly what I wanted seat included. Garage sale $30.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After I bought it- I saw the reviews after the fact- a nice half liked it and the other half didn’t so I wasn’t sure what I was getting- I’m small at 5’3 ( it’s a small bike) so I love it!!!!! It’s sturdy well made - and u get a heavy workout - it works u!!!! I never built anything in my life- I watched the video on how to put it together- I did it myself- I’m really happy with it. If your tall- don’t buy this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Shelee Maylett

customer_reviews.title: Wheel out of alignment
customer_reviews.text: Used this byke very little and the wheel came out of alignment (it wobbles), try to fix it myself and broke accidentally the speed meter, it looks good and works ok until it started giving me problems within two months of light use. I do not recommend this byke also it is very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and for shorter people.
customer_reviews.text: It was just ok.I am 5'11" with a 32" inseam. Seat to pedal position was bad (pedals right below) and even with the seat in the highest position, I couldn't extend my leg. The arms were a bit too far forward and did not extend up high enough. I just couldn't live with the purchase so returned it and purchased a rower instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Wow, got here quickly, and was easy to assemble. I didn't use the professional service, and it went together quickly. Good quality material and construction, I expect to burn lots of fat cells on this bike!
customer_reviews.author: catkin27

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this fan bike tell about 1.5-2 weeks ago it started falling apart,literally. I order this junk Dec 22nd 2019 and I received it first week of Jan 2020. Assembly was fairly easy it’s just poorly made. Remember YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. Junk Junk Junk
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter put bike together. Had no problem. It's a great bike. Tells you calories burned, speed, distance, etc. My husband has now started to use it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sue w

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bike for the value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bike for the value, and it comes with step by step instructions and all the tools to put it together. However, the seat is terrible and very uncomfortable. I bought a faux sheepskin padded cover and that helps.It should be a little bigger. And a little closer, I am short and can't quite reach the handle bars, so I end up leaning forward a little much. Overall it gives a good workout though.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in despite of the bad reviews and negative comments but I regretted from the first time I used it till now. It is very uncomfortable and last night while using the Handel came out and it almost thorough me off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: I like that we can adjust the tension of the bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple exercise bike, I bought it for my mom. I like that we can adjust the tension of the bike. This is best compared to others because this one really makes you pick up your knees and you feel the burn. other bikes just make your feet spin in little circles that dont do much for your body. This bike doesn't take up a lot of space. 2 very stubborn people can build this bike in less than an hour lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike Good Price. I Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I received my bike today. I am 5' 7' tall so I put the seat up high. I have no problem riding it. My husband is 5' 11". He had no problem riding it either. I gave it 4 stars, because the seat hurts my butt. Other than that, I love it. Great price, easy to assemble, easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: scooby doo in LA

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great. I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. I use it all the time. I specifically bought it for my husband for his knee replacement. It's too tall so he sits on a chair behind the bike and pedals that way. Works great. Has a lot of features for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the money. The bike isn't too hard to assemble. (especially because husband did it alone...) Bike is sturdy and feels stable when riding. I have read reviews about the seat, and they are true. The seat is not made for comfort. We will probably invest in a different seat for it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb C

customer_reviews.title: This bike really gives a good sweat after only 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This bike really gives a good sweat after only 15 minutes. I can understand why people are saying it is too small though. I am 5'11" and my knees don't fully extend, but it doesn't really bother me. It is also a bit loud. I had to move my music closer to me. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy Named Me

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. It is very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. It is very uncomfortable, even with a seat cover. My wife is 4'10" and she finds it uncomfortable, I am 6'2" and find it uncomfortable and way too small. We have gotten rid of it already.
customer_reviews.author: Aleesia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Belt breaks and it's all over.
customer_reviews.text: If you're only going to do light to occasionally moderate cycling on this, it may last a few months. Husband used this and enjoyed it for about 6 weeks when belt broke and plastic on housing broke. Waste of $$$. It was not abused, just poorly made. Would *not* recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AvidproxyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money. Just needs a better seat
customer_reviews.text: awesome bike. Really well put together. I bought it as a gift to my mother who is about 120 lbs 4'8 and this is perfect for her. I'm a 240 lbs. 5'10 and have used it a couple of times. It took me about 30 min to assemble and instructions were handy. The only thing that could be best is the seat, it is uncomfortable after a few minutes on the bike. As to my mom, she says she's ok with the seat but wouldn't mind some extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo R.

customer_reviews.title: How easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product very much. Bought it fot my neighbor lasy and she is very hapy and satisified with it. It was real easy to put together did it all alone. The directions were the best that I have ever had putting things together even better than Walmarts as I use to work for them but there directions were hard for me to follow. But not this bike. Would recommend this bike to anyone. The price was great. Karl Port Richey,Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Handle bottom screw comes off whenever I ride it!
customer_reviews.text: My bike is defective. Whenever I ride it, the screw that goes at the bottom of the right arm handle falls off. I have to stop riding and screw it back on and do that over and over. Yes, I have screwed it tight, no matter how tight it is, the screw always comes off. I contacted the manufacturer and all they did was send me a replacement for the same screw and washers that fall off. I regret this purchase, as I am not able to enjoy riding this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary! I couldn't believe how easy it was to assemble and the ride is quite and smooth. The fan blows up from the front wheels and gives a cool breeze while riding. I love the movement of the handlebars. It gives my waist and arms and great workout also. And you can't beat the price. I would certainly recommend this exercise bike to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: John Kwok

customer_reviews.title: i have bought two of these bikes. for the ...
customer_reviews.text: i have bought two of these bikes.for the money they work well but after around a year with daily use of 30 to 45mins the belt will snap from wear.as far as i can tell you cannot replace.that is major defect as far as i am concerned.am looking for bike with chain.these belts are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: steven r. price

customer_reviews.title: This bike was pretty affordable, which is why I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This bike was pretty affordable, which is why I bought it. However the seat is so damn uncomfortable. I even bought a padded seat cover and that didn't help that much. Also the timer was a bit weird in that it wouldn't reset when I would stop biking and get off for the day. However it was a nice thing to have in the apartment to place in front of the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Smith

product_meta.title: Body Rider BRF700 Exercise Upright Fan Bike (with UPDATED Softer Seat) Stationary Fitness / Adjustable Seat
product_meta.description:
The Body Flex Sports exercise cycle bikes are here to take your fitness routine to the next level. Whether you're a professional athlete looking to add to your home gym or you’re a beginner embarking on a health journey for the first time, this upright exercise bike is a great tool to add to any fitness regimen. Cardio exercise is great for your heart, and this fitness bike helps you achieve a steady workout while sitting at home. It's the perfect cardio machine and workout bike to use for home exercise. This stationary bike for indoor riding is one of the best workout machines for recovery after your next big race or other athletic challenge. It also provides a low-impact way for the elderly and people with sensitive joints to get a low-impact workout in without the pain. You never have to wait for the perfect weather to use your bicycle; this indoor cycling bike can be used rain or shine. There's even a fan wheel to keep you cool! The seat is adjustable to accommodate many heights and comfort levels. Place the bike in front of your favorite window or turn on your favorite show and pedal away! These exercise machines are made to make getting fit easier than ever.

Body Flex Sports is a private, family-owned company established in 1996. We’re dedicated to creating a gym-level fitness experience that makes it easy and affordable to take your health to the next level. We make exercise equipment you can always depend on. We make a point of using premium-quality materials, state-of-the-art manufacturing processes, and strict quality control. We pride the health and well-being of Body Flex on the health and well-being of your body. Our ultimate goal is to bring true benefits and wholesome results to the strength, stamina, and soundness of your health. We measure our success according to this purpose and strive to achieve it through our team of incredible workers, extensive research, and development processes. When you want a gym-quality workout at home, choose Body Flex Sports.

AMAZON.COM
This versatile Body Rider Fan Bike allows you to have an elliptical and upper body workout in one machine. The bike's ergonomic design engages your arms and upper body for a true full-body workout by targeting cardio and strength training. It also features an adjustable seat for multiple users and a fan wheel to keep you cool while working up a sweat. 

Key Features:

 * Dual-action handlebars engage an upper and lower body workout 
 * Tension adjusts easily with the turn of a knob 
 * Innovative fan wheel emits a gentle, cooling breeze 
 * Easy-to-use digital display tracks time, speed, distance, and calories burned 
 * Stable steel frame 
 * Assembled Dimensions: 41.75 by 22 by 46.5 inches 
 * Assembled Weight: 47.3 pounds 
 * Weight Capacity: 250 pounds 

Manufacturer's Warranty
Body Flex Sports warrants your product for a period of one year for the frame and 90 days on all parts if the item is used for the intended purpose, properly maintained, and not used commercially. Any alterations or incorrect assembly of the product will void this warranty.
feature_bullets: QUIET & LOW-IMPACT CARDIO: This bike will enhance home workout sessions with ease. Cycle your way to fitness and rehabilitation with this practical, functional indoor bike featuring a built-in belt drive system (versus other bikes with loud chain drive)

ADJUSTABLE & EASY TO USE: The bike’s ergonomic design with belt drive system engages your arms and upper body for a true full-body workout. Increase or decrease your workout intensity with the built-in resistance adjustment knob
MADE FOR YOUR HOME FITNESS GOALS: This exercise machine also features an updated bidirectional adjustable seat for maximum comfort and an encased fan flywheel for smooth workout sessions

ESSENTIAL BASICS: Invest in your health by adding this workout equipment to your home! This low-cost exercise bike still has the resistance system and ergonomic design in place to provide an effective cardio workout

DESIGNED FOR ALL FITNESS LEVELS: Jumpstart and make progress to reach your HIIT, home, and rehabilitation fitness goals. This durable indoor bike will help you advance in your fitness journey and complements other workout equipment
DIMENSIONS: 41.75" x 22" x 46.5"| 47.3 pounds | Weight Capacity: 250 pounds
